member.name: M:AnimalCrossingAPI.Controllers.FishController.ListFish
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all fish, including their availability information.
member.returns: A list of fish with detailed information.

member.name: M:AnimalCrossingAPI.Controllers.FishController.GetFishByName(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for fish by name, supporting partial name matches.
member.param: The name or partial name of the fish to search for.
member.returns: A list of fish that match the search criteria.

member.name: M:AnimalCrossingAPI.Controllers.FishController.CreateFish(AnimalCrossingAPI.Models.CreateFishDto)
member.summary: Creates a new fish entry in the database.
member.param: The data containing details about the new fish.
member.returns: The created fish with its generated identifier.

member.name: M:AnimalCrossingAPI.Controllers.FishController.UpdateFishAvailability(System.Int32,AnimalCrossingAPI.Models.FishAvailabilityUpdateDto)
member.summary: Updates the availability information of an existing fish.
member.param: The unique identifier of the fish to update.
The data containing availability information to update.
member.returns: A confirmation of successful update or an error if the fish is not found.

member.name: M:AnimalCrossingAPI.Controllers.FishController.UpdateFish(System.Int32,AnimalCrossingAPI.Models.FishUpdateDto)
member.summary: Updates details of an existing fish (excluding availability information).
member.param: The unique identifier of the fish to update.
The data containing updated fish details.
member.returns: A confirmation of successful update or an error if the fish is not found.

member.name: M:AnimalCrossingAPI.Controllers.FishController.GetFishBelowPrice(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of fish with prices below the specified amount.
member.param: The maximum price to filter fish by.
member.returns: A list of fish where the price is below the specified amount.

member.name: M:AnimalCrossingAPI.Controllers.FishController.GetFishByLocation(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of fish based on their availability location.
member.param: The location to filter fish by.
member.returns: A list of fish available in the specified location.
